Egh. like call him every week to check up on stuff. it's like OH HEY WHAT DID YOU DO THIS WEEK?
I played computer games till 4-6 every day then slept till 5 pm. how about you?
oh, I went to work and this weekend I had another kinky episode of sex on my boat with my girlfriend. 
oh lovely.

I jst got back from England. was there for a week. Wow it feels really strange being back here. It IS better there than here I will say that. Few would agree with me cause theyre patriotic twats with no thought for themselves. The cars are shinier there I swear to god. That's all I really want to say. but I gues I oculd say I went to this town called Dorking (fuckin awesome name), for a few days then went to this hotel in london, and drove to oxford. That was for a day then like 3 days in london with my mom. I saw all the stuff. And I pretty much know how to get around there now. via the 'tubes' (underground train you cunt). and like I saw the 'stuff' (the huge fucking ferris wheel, that one palace where they have the guards I forgot the name I'll remember it in a minute. and big ben and the tower of london.
